short_summary: The department of Public Works wishes to acquire gym equipment for the 1st regiment of engineers in Edmonton.
description: Acquisition and deployment of gym equipment for Combat Engineer Regiment (CER) in Edmonton, Alberta.
full_summary:
### Notice ID: WS3802015307
#### Tender Information

* **Tender Title**: W0127-22P033 – Portable Gym and Stationary Gym Equipment
* **Date Published**: February 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: Initially scheduled for February 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. **Note:** The closing time has been amended to March 3, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.
* **Contract Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Delivery**: Edmonton, Alberta
* **Department of National Defence (DND) Requirement**
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of gym equipment and deployable gym equipment for 1 Combat Engineer Regiment (CER) in Edmonton, Alberta.

#### Tender Details

* **Contact Information**
  * Name: Lyland Wiebe (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Email: [lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notices and Attachments**
  * Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15344170?extsite=MTUzNDQxNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Important Notes

Please note that the closing time for the tender has been amended to March 3, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Late bids will not be accepted. Required supporting documentation and bid submission must reach the contracting authority on or before the new closing date. Thank you for your attention to this matter. [endif]
